channel.title: PI - Need help with this

item.title: PI - Need help with this
item.dc:creator: @Atreyu1993 Atreyu1993
item.description:
@Atreyu1993 wrote:

if (itemId == 5) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@Server Achievement Diary", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@bla@PvM Achievments", 8147); if(c.jadAchieve = false) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Defeat Tz-Tok Jad", 8148); } else if(c.jadAchieve = true) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Defeat Tz-Tok Jad", 8148); }
Im pretty sure i did it correct(Im entirely new to java), even though jadAchieve is set false, it still comes out green in the interface. Anybody see anything wrong, or have any tips for me?

Read full topic
